import React from "react" import penPath from "../images/pen.svg" import plusPath from "../images/plus.svg" import api from "../utils/Api" function Main(props) { const [userName, setUserName] = React.useState(""); const [userDescription, setUserDescription] = React.useState(""); const [userAvatar, setUserAvatar] = React.useState(""); const [cards, setCards] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { api.getProfile() .then((data) => { setUserName(data.name); setUserDescription(data.about) setUserAvatar(data.avatar) }) }); return(

{userName}

{userDescription}

0
); } export default Main
